Address.title: Address
Address.description: A Cardano address (either legacy format or new format).

AddressAttributes.title: AddressAttributes
AddressAttributes.description: Extra attributes carried by Byron addresses (network magic and/or HD payload).

AssetQuantity.title: AssetQuantity
AssetQuantity.description: A number of asset, can be negative went burning assets.

BlockHeight.title: BlockHeight
BlockHeight.description: A block number, the i-th block to be minted is number i.

Bound.title: Bound
Bound.description: An era bound which captures the time, slot and epoch at which the era start. The time is relative to the start time of the network.

oneOf.description: A stake delegation certificate, from a delegator to a stake pool.
oneOf.title: stakeDelegation

oneOf.description: A stake credential (key or script) registration certificate.
oneOf.title: stakeCredentialRegistration
TreasuryTransfer<Internal>
oneOf.description: A transfer from or to the treasury / reserves authored by genesis delegates.

oneOf.title: TreasuryTransfer<Rewards>
oneOf.description: A transfer from or to the treasury / reserves authored by genesis delegates.

ChainCode.title: ChainCode
ChainCode.description: An Ed25519-BIP32 chain-code for key deriviation.

Digest<Any>.title: Digest<Any>
Digest<Any>.description: A hash digest from an unspecified algorithm and length.

Digest<Blake2b, 224>.title: Digest<Blake2b, 224>
Digest<Blake2b, 224>.description: A Blake2b 28-byte hash digest, encoded in base16.

Digest<Blake2b, 256>.title: Digest<Blake2b, 256>
Digest<Blake2b, 256>.description: A Blake2b 32-byte hash digest, encoded in base16.

EraParameters.title: EraParameters
EraParameters.description: Parameters that can vary across hard forks.

EraSummary.title: EraSummary
EraSummary.description: Summary of the confirmed parts of the ledger.

Genesis<Byron>.title: Genesis<Byron>
Genesis<Byron>.description: A Byron genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

Genesis<Shelley>.title: Genesis<Shelley>
Genesis<Shelley>.description: A Shelley genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

Genesis<Alonzo>.title: Genesis<Alonzo>
Genesis<Alonzo>.description: An Alonzo genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

Genesis<Conway>.title: Genesis<Conway>
Genesis<Conway>.description: An Conway genesis configuration, with information used to bootstrap the era. Some parameters are also updatable across the era.

GenesisDelegate.title: GenesisDelegate
GenesisDelegate.description: A Genesis delegate, in charge of Cardano's governance.

GenesisStakePools.title: GenesisStakePools
GenesisStakePools.description: A Genesis stake pools configuration; primarily used for bootstrapping test networks.

ExtendedVerificationKey.title: ExtendedVerificationKey
ExtendedVerificationKey.description: An Ed25519-BIP32 Byron genesis delegate verification key with chain-code.

lovelace.description: A number of lovelace, possibly large when summed up.
An amount, possibly negative, in Lovelace (1e6 Lovelace = 1 Ada).

additionalProperties.description: An associated metadatum, as a CBOR bytestring or a JSON object if possible. Some binary representations cannot be represented in plain JSON and the 'json' field is therefore omitted.

Network.title: Network
Network.description: A network target, as defined since the Shelley era.

NetworkMagic.title: NetworkMagic
NetworkMagic.description: A magic number for telling networks apart. (e.g. 764824073)

OperationalCertificate.title: OperationalCertificate
OperationalCertificate.description: Certificate identifying a stake pool operator.

Origin.title: Origin
Origin.description: The origin of the blockchain. This point is special in the sense that it doesn't point to any existing slots, but is preceding any existing other point.

StakePoolId.title: StakePoolId
StakePoolId.description: A Blake2b 32-byte hash digest of a pool's verification key.

Ratio.title: Ratio
Ratio.description: A ratio of two integers, to express exact fractions.

RelativeTime.title: RelativeTime
RelativeTime.description: A time in seconds relative to another one (typically, system start or era start).

RewardAccount.title: RewardAccount
RewardAccount.description: A reward account, also known as 'stake address'.

SafeZone.title: SafeZone
SafeZone.description: Number of slots from the tip of the ledger in which it is guaranteed that no hard fork can take place. This should be (at least) the number of slots in which we are guaranteed to have k blocks.

Script<Native>.title: Script<Native>
Script<Native>.description: A phase-1 monetary script. Timelocks constraints are only supported since Allegra.

SlotLength.title: SlotLength
SlotLength.description: A slot length, in seconds, possibly with decimals.

cbor.description: The raw serialized (CBOR) transaction, as found on-chain.

TransactionId.title: TransactionId
TransactionId.description: A Blake2b 32-byte hash digest of a transaction body

TransactionOutput.title: TransactionOutput
TransactionOutput.description: A transaction output. Since Mary, 'value' always return a multi-asset value. Since Alonzo, 'datumHash' is always present (albeit sometimes 'null'). Since Babbage, 'datum' & 'script' are always present (albeit sometimes 'null').
